item.title: Report I-2024060024
item.description:
Report I-2024060024

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-21T15:17:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-13
  • City: Bay City
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: PVS TRANSPORTATION, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PVS Transportation driver was scheduled to deliver a shipment of Sodium Hydroxide to Michigan Sugar. The driver arrived on site was escorted by an employee and was directed to hook up into the customefs new tank which the driver was told would be the first delivery into tank. Driver hooked up and was making delivery and the connection was not hooked up resulting in approximately 10 gallons of Sodium Hydroxide to be released. 1

item.title: Report E-2024060061
item.description:
Report E-2024060061

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-17T18:16:00+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-29
  • City: WATERFORD TOWNSHIP
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: DAYTON FREIGHT LINES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Dayton Freight personnel observed approximately one (1) gallon of material released from one (1) 5-gallon metal pial. The released material impacted the concrete terminal floor due to a forklift puncture. Dayton Freight personnel cleaned the impacted area and containerized the cleanup debris and damaged pail into one (1) 15-gallon poly drum. The generated waste was staged onsite at the terminal in a secure location. The generated waste will remain onsite for Dayton Freight's contracted hazardous waste vendor to coordinate disposal.
